attributes.action: Ban Bill Oddie from appearing on the BBC
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: During the last two weeks, the presence of autumn watch on BBC2 has meant that University Challenge has not been broadcast. For depriving the British public of one of the only decent and non-mindless programmes available, Bill Oddie should be forever vanquished from publically subsidised television.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
